pr_title: Allow to control FlakyTestRetryAnalyzer with session property

timeline.message:
Allow to control FlakyTestRetryAnalyzer with session property

Now session property overrides CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION. So even when
CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION is set, FlakyTestRetryAnalyzer can be disabled
with the session property.

timeline.bodyText: This is hard to understand for me.
timeline.author: findepi
